entries.meaning: (now sometimes offensive) A person who performs abortions, especially illegally or secretly.
examples: Synonyms: (rare) aborter, (historical, euphemism) angel maker, (UK) jack-knife barber

entries.meaning: (chiefly derogatory) A person who advocates for or supports the legality of abortion.
examples: Antonyms: anti-abortionist, (derogatory) anti-choicer, (derogatory) fetus fetishist, (derogatory) forced-birther, pro-lifer, right-to-lifer
